title: Yuri Mitrokhin
text:
Yuri Sergeyevich Mitrokhin (; born 10 October 1997) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Professional%20Football%20League">Russian Professional Football League</a> for <a href="FC%20Kuban-2%20Krasnodar">FC Kuban-2 Krasnodar</a> on 28 July 2016 in a game against <a href="FC%20Spartak%20Vladikavkaz">FC Spartak Vladikavkaz</a>.
He made his debut for the main squad of <a href="FC%20Kuban%20Krasnodar">FC Kuban Krasnodar</a> on 24 August 2016 in a <a href="Russian%20Cup%20%28football%29">Russian Cup</a> game against <a href="FC%20Energomash%20Belgorod">FC Energomash Belgorod</a>.
